template.template: Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1
template.name: Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1

item.name: Hardware model name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Device uptime
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

item.name: Number of all AP's on site

trigger_prototype.name: Operational status was changed on {HOST.NAME} interface {#SNMPVALUE}

resource.name: Wirelss traffic on site
resource.host: Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1

resource.name: Connected clients on site
resource.host: Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1

trigger.expression: {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:unifi.ap.state[{#ID}, version].change()}=1
trigger.name: AP {#ALIAS} firmware version is changed

trigger.expression: {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:unifi.ap.state[{#ID}, isolated].min(1m)}=1
trigger.name: AP {#ALIAS} is isolated > 1 min

trigger.expression: {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:unifi.ap.state[{#ID}, adopted].max(1m)}=0
trigger.name: AP {#ALIAS} is not adopted > 1m

trigger.expression: {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.diff()}=1 and {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Firmware version has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:ubntChipsetVersion.regexp("XM")}=1 and {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:ubntWlStatNoiseFloor.last()}<-101
trigger.name: High Noise Floor ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:unifi.site.state[ap, isolated, count].min(1m)}>0
trigger.name: Isolated APs exists on {HOST.HOST}

trigger.expression: {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:unifi.site.state[ap, adopted, count].max(1m)}<{Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:unifi.site.state[ap, items_num, count].max(1m)}
trigger.name: Nonadopted APs exists on {HOST.HOST}
No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

trigger.expression: {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:ubntChipsetVersion.regexp("XM")}=1 and {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:ubntWlStatCcq.last()}<90
trigger.name: Poor CCQ ({ITEM.LASTVALUE}) on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:ubntChipsetVersion.regexp("XM")}=1 and {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:ubntWlStatCcq.last()}<95
trigger.name: {$SNMP_COMMUNITY}

trigger.expression: {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:ubntChipsetVersion.regexp("XM")}=1 and {Template Ubiquiti Unifi AP LR SNMPv1:ubntWlStatNoiseFloor.last()}>-90
trigger.name: {$SNMP_COMMUNITY}
{HOST.NAME} has been restarted
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. The device uptime is less than 10 minutes

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} has been restarted
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. The device uptime is less than 10 minutes
